text: Tak My rozpovily tse lyudyam, shchob vony znaly, shcho obitsyanka Allaha pravdyva y nemaye sumnivu v nastanni Chasu. Lyudy pochaly sperechatysya pro [yunakiv] i skazaly: «Zbuduyte nad nymy sporudu! Yikhnʹomu Hospodu krashche znaty pro nykh!» Ale ti, chyya dumka perevazhyla, vidpovily: «Spravdi, my zbuduyemo nad nymy khram!»
